Performance:
January 1995: The Two-Colored Reins

Production: January 1995

Play: The Two-Colored Reins (恋女房染分手綱)

Scenes:

Backgammon (道中双六 / Dochū sugoroku)

Shigenoi's Parting with Her Son (重の井子別れ / Shigenoi kowakare)

Characters:

Saemon Yurugi (Yurugi Saemon / 由留木左衛門)

Sanai Sagisaka (Sagisaka Sanai / 鷺坂左内)

Yosabei Date (Date Yosobei (Yosabei) / 伊達与三兵衛)

Ohana, a maid (Koshimoto Ohana / 腰元お花)

Oharu, a maid (Koshimoto Oharu / 腰元お春)

Oyuki, a maid (Koshimoto Oyuki / 腰元お雪)

Shigenoi (Menoto Shigenoi / 乳人重の井)

Priest (Wakisō / 脇僧)

Sadanoshin Takemura (Takemura Sadanoshin / 竹村定之進)

Hachizo, a pack horse driver (Umakata Hachizō / 馬方八蔵)

Jirosaku, a pack horse driver (Umakata Jirosaku / 馬方治郎作)

Hachizo's mother (Hachizō no haha / 八蔵の母)

Rice dealer (Kakegoi Komeya / 掛乞米屋)

Cloth dealer (Kakegoi Nunoya / 掛乞布屋)

Yonosuke (Segare Yonosuke / 伜与之助)

Keimasa, a blind masseur (Zatō Keimasa / 座頭慶政 (座頭慶政実は伊達与八郎))

Yaheiji (Happeiji) Washizuka (Washizuka Happeiji (Yaheiji) / 鷲塚八平次)

Highway robber (Warumono / 悪者)

Shirabe (Shirabe Hime / 調姫)

Ofuku, a maid (Koshimoto Ofuku / 腰元お福)

Dancer (Odoriko / 踊り子)

Transport manager (Sairyō / 宰領)

Yasazaemon Honda (Honda Yasozaemon / 本田弥三左衛門)

Sankichi (Umakata Sankichi / 馬方三吉)

Wakana, a maid (Koshimoto Wakana / 腰元若菜)
